SFields¶

All existing rippled SFields. (They’re all here, they just haven’t been fully documented yet.)

The full list is available in the rippled codebase.

All existing SFields.

class xrpl_plugin.sfields.SField¶

Bases: pybind11_object

A serialized field that can be included in transactions and ledger objects.

property fieldCode¶

(fieldType<<16)|fieldValue

property fieldName¶

The name of the field.

property fieldNum¶
property fieldType¶

The SType of the field.

property fieldValue¶

The unique value of the field for that SType.

xrpl_plugin.sfields.sf_tick_size = sfTickSize¶

The number of significant digits in the exchange rate of an offer.
